name: piper
description: Piper is a protocol for driving audio feature extractors. This library provides ways of implementing clients and servers in JavaScript for the Piper protocol.

scripts.profile: npm run timings && node --prof-process $(ls -1tr isolate*.log | tail -1) > profile.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf fft *.js *.js.map *.d.ts dist extractors client-stubs fft protocols servers
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build-src-only && cp -r dist/ts/* .
scripts.coveralls: npm run clean && npm run cover && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Lucas Thompson
